sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>When attempting to defend a computer system against intrusion, the character upgrades the difficulty of an opponent's dice pool a number of times equal to his rank of defensive slicing. This replaces the usual benefits from Defensive Slicing.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Defensive Slicing (Improved)</name> <number>TAL0001172</number> <passive_or_active>passive</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-10-13 19:54:38</sys_created_on> <sys_id>9cc968da2fbfd090e0f497eef699b66a</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-10-13 19:54:38</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
